title: FOX Sports: Latest Stories, Scores & Events
description:
The All-New Fox Sports app allows you to discover the latest sports stories, browse scores, watch live events, follow your favorite teams, and more!
Why FOX Sports is Different:
* Easy way to find the latest sports stories, scores, schedules and standings.
* Best-in-class discoverability of live games, speed, quality, and stability for the top properties in sports
* Enhanced Favoriting and Navigation helps you track and arrange teams, scores, news, and live video in one place.
* Get the latest scoop without leaving the app. See what the biggest names in sports are up to with Trending Stories, Tweets, Posts, and more.
* Reimagined team and event pages utilizing new data sources, visualizations, team news via content aggregation, and social conversation from experts and fans.
Live Sports:
• Watch all your favorite sports: MLB, NFL Football Sunday Package, NFL Thursday Night Football, NCAA Football, NCAA Basketball, Big 10 College Football & Basketball, Big 12 College Football, Big East College Basketball, Pac 12 College Football & Basketball, WWE SmackDown, PBC Boxing, NHRA Formula E and ARCA motor sports, NASCAR, Bundesliga Soccer, Men & Women World Cup, Gold Cup Soccer, Confederation Cup Soccer, FIFA Club World Cup, Liga MX Soccer, MLS Soccer, PBA Bowling, Tennis, Rugby, and other must-see live events.
Trending Stories:
• Easily discover the top stories of the day - with regular updates on the home tab from the best analysts in the game.
Real-Time Game Alerts and Scores:
• Never miss the news or scores you care about with personalized updates from your favorite teams and leagues.
Live Games and Events:
• Stream all FOX Sports events with live stats, recaps, and highlights of every big moment.
• Also get live news and access to games playing right now on other networks.
Studio Shows:
• Enjoy opinion and debate with top personalities on FS1 Studio Shows—Skip & Shannon: Undisputed, The Herd with Colin Cowherd, First Things First, Speak For Yourself with Whitlock and Wiley, Lock It In, NASCAR Race Hub, MLB Whiparound, Fair Game with Kristine Leahy, and several FOX Deportes shows when you sign in with your TV Provider credentials.
Big Ten Network:
• BTN is now available on the Fox Sports app
• BTN is the premier network for coverage of America's legendary collegiate athletic conference.
• Watch live BTN-televised games and events, as well as original BTN shows (The Journey, Big Ten Elite, Big Ten Icons and Campus Eats) when you log in with your TV Provider credentials.
• Follow your favorite B1G schools on the Fox Sports app: Illinois Fighting Illini, Indiana Hoosiers, Iowa Hawkeyes, Maryland Terrapins, Michigan Wolverines, Michigan State Spartans, Minnesota Golden Gophers, Nebraska Cornhuskers, Northwestern Wildcats, Ohio State Buckeyes, Penn State Nittany Lions, Purdue Boilermakers, Rutgers Scarlet Knights, Wisconsin Badgers.
EULA URL - http://www.foxsports.com/end-user-license-agreement?nav=false
Terms of Use URL - http://www.foxsports.com/terms-of-use?nav=false
This app features Nielsen's proprietary measurement software which will measure your viewing for market research purposes, like Nielsen's TV Ratings. Please see www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information.
